short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CapSumo user can copy the view source of web page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension is for a CapSumo user to copy the view source of their form's page on a popup form.
